short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web page source capture tool for SWAT, supporting pages with frames and realtime HTML rendering.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SWAT Page Capture is a tool to capture the HTMLs which is used for adding/updating page knowledge in SWATHub. Compared with Save As HTML function of web browser, Page Capture Tool can handle frame structured web application and support real-time rendered HTML DOM content.
